data.comment: The match has started.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Toronto at Yankee Stadium.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick New York City.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Bronx.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 5, Goal kick for Toronto at Yankee Stadium.
Toronto have a dangerous throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Toronto close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Toronto, close to New York City's area.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Toronto.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Toronto throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Toronto in the half of New York City.
New York City drives forward and Valentin Castellanos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 11, New York City push upfield and Valentin Castellanos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Toronto defence.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Toronto.
In the minute 16, Toronto are caught offside.
Keaton Parks of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
In the minute 17, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, New York City's Jesus Medina gets in a shot on goal at Yankee Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Joseph Dickerson awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 22, In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Alexander Callens is booked for the home team.
In the minute 24, Throw-in New York City.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 25, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City.
Pablo Piatti (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
New York City's Gary Mackay Steven gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 26, Toronto have a goal kick.
New York City are whistled for offside.
In Bronx, Jesus Medina of New York City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to New York City.
Important block from the Toronto defence as Anton Tinnerholm fires in a strike for New York City.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Toronto.
Keaton Parks (New York City) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 32, Alexander Callens (New York City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Joseph Dickerson awards Toronto a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Toronto to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Attention is being given to New York Cityâ€™s James Sands and play has been suspended briefly.
Alejandro Pozuelo for Toronto drives towards goal at Yankee Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Toronto have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valentin Castellanos (New York City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for New York City in Bronx.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, New York City's James Sands looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Yankee Stadium, Toronto are penalized for being offside.
Can New York City capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City.
In the minute 40, Nick DeLeon (Toronto) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 42, Gudmundur Thorarinsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a Toronto throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 44, Toronto needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
New York City drive upfield and Alexander Ring gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
New York City are caught offside.
New York City to take a throw-in in Toronto territory.
In the minute 45, New York City are whistled for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Yankee Stadium.
New York City's Jesus Medina breaks free at Yankee Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Erickson Gallardo is replacing Nick DeLeon for the away team.
Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Toronto at Yankee Stadium.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to New York City.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
In the minute 53, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Toronto.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
In the minute 56, Jozy Altidore (Toronto) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Heber is on a sub for Valentin Castellanos for New York City.
In the minute 58, New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gudmundur Thorarinsson (New York City) strikes at Yankee Stadium but his header is cleared.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 61, Maxime Chanot (New York City) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Toronto at Yankee Stadium.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a second substitution, with Justin Morrow replacing Tony Gallacher.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 62, Greg Vanney is making the team's third substitution at Yankee Stadium with Jayden Nelson replacing Jozy Altidore.
In the minute 63, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In Bronx a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jayden Nelson is booked for the away team.
In the minute 65, In Bronx New York City drive forward through Alexander Ring. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Gudmundur Thorarinsson with Ronald Matarrita.
In the minute 70, Ismael Tajouri is replacing Gary Mackay Steven for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
The home team have replaced Jesus Medina with Alexandru Mitrita. This is the third substitution made today by Ronny Deila.
Throw-in for New York City at Yankee Stadium.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
James Sands (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
Joseph Dickerson awards New York City a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ayo Akinola of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Erickson Gallardo for Toronto gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of New York City.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, New York City have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Throw-in Toronto.
In Bronx New York City drive forward through Ronald Matarrita. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 79, Toronto drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Toronto.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of New York City.
In the minute 82, Free kick in a good position for Toronto!
Toronto's Omar Gonzalez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bronx.
In the minute 83, In Bronx, New York City push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Joseph Dickerson waits before resuming play because Heber for New York City is still down.
Nicolas Acevedo (New York City) has replaced the possibly injured Heber.
In the minute 88, Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a fourth substitution, with Patrick Mullins replacing Ayo Akinola.
Toronto have been given a penalty...
Nicolas Acevedo (New York City) gets a yellow card.
Goal kick for Toronto at Yankee Stadium.
Free kick New York City.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York City.
That's full-time at Yankee Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
Alejandro Pozuelo nets and Toronto now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
